ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY_ADDITIONAL.OFFICIALNAME: Office national de l’électricité et de l’eau potable

TITLE.P: Visual inspection of the subsea interconnection Spain-Morocco

SHORT_DESCR.P: The project consists of a visual inspection of the submarine cables Spain-Morocco (ESMA) electrical interconnection that consists of 2 cables ESMA I (30 km between Tarifa (Spain) and Fardouia (Morocco) and 4x400 kV SCFF) and ESMA II (30 km between Tarifa (Spain) and Fardouia (Morocco) and 3x400 kV SCFF). Maximum depth approximately of 640 metres.
This project is part of the agreement that exists between REE and ONEE for the construction and operation of the electrical interconnection between Spain and Morocco.

Maintenance work scheduled in accordance with the inspection criteria defined in the performance as detailedin the technical specifications for the submarine inspection of the existing 7 cables in the Spain-Morocco interconnection. Pay responsibilities for work performed must be borne 50% by REE and 50% by ONEE (both owners of such interconnection).

SUITABILITY.P: C.1.1 Company Details: Name, VAT number, Contact key person, telephone, eMail, address.
C1.2 Enrolment on professional or trade register.
C1.3 Certificate proving that the contractor is not be in bankrupt or in the process of being wound up.
C1.4 Document in which the same contractor indicates is not have their affairs administrated by the court, or have entered into an arrangement with creditors.
C1.5 Certificate proving compliance with the social security on their Country or an international social security agreement.
C1.6 Document certifying the contractor is up to date with all payments to the Tax Authority or to the equivalent fiscal Authority of his country.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: C2.1 Average annual operating results for the last 3 years.
C2.2 Average annual manpower for each of the last 5 years.

C2.3 Contractor must have fulfilled their obligations relating to the payment of social security contributions and their obligations relating to payment of taxes and duties, in accordance with the legal provisions of the country where they are established.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Minimum average for the last 3 years annual turnover: 2 000 000,00 EUR.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: C3.1 Information demonstrating its capacity and relevant previous experience, including a detailed list ofprojects of a similar nature (design, construction and installation of cable for high voltage subsea connections) executed in the last 10 years. Details of current and relevant contracts in this area should be included. Short description of the work performed shall be provided including beginning and end of works, location and contract value.

C3.2 A quality project plan for a recent project should be presented (executed in the last 5 years). That plan should also include a work team proposal that includes CV and experience references in similar projects.
C3.3 Equipment with which the project will be implemented, will be detailed, indicating if this equipment is own equipment or subcontracted (vessel, ROV,…).

C3.4 An appropriate environmental and occupational health and safety plans of a recent project should be presented (project executed in the last 5 years). Generic reference manuals will not be accepted.
C3.5 Information demonstrating its experience in project management at international level.

RULES_CRITERIA.P: This Contract Notice is launched simultaneously by REE (Red Eléctrica de España) and ONEE (Office National de l’Electricité et de l’Eau Potable). The expression of interest to participate must be submitted to both companies at the eMail addresses mentioned in Subsection 1.1.

Ability to generate and handle all contractual documents in English language. In case the original documents are in another language, translation must be certified by the diplomatic or consular authority as appropriate.

Documents required must be provided by the candidate as part of its reply to the Notice to tender. The not provision of the requested documents may lead to the candidate not being selected for the tender.

DEPOSIT_GUARANTEE_REQUIRED.P: To be detailed during tendering phase.

LEGAL_FORM.P: Non-temporary groupings of economic operators or joint ventures are allowed for this Invitation to Tender.
